public class Plotarea
extends Object

Plotarea()

draw(Graphics)
Draws a plotting region to the specified Graphics class
draw3d(Graphics)
Draws a plotting region with 3-D visual effects using the specified Graphics class.
getGc()
Inquires the Gc used for this Plotarea's graphical attributes
getLlX()
Inquires the lower left X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
getLlY()
Inquires the lower left Y location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
getUrX()
Inquires the upper right X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
getUrY()
Inquires the upper right Y location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
getUseDisplayList()
Inquires whether this Plotarea should add objects to the chart's global DisplayList.
resize(int, int)
Resizes the ploting area based on changes in the overall chart size.
setGc(Gc)
Sets a new Gc for this Plotarea
setLlX(double)
Sets the lower left X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
setLlY(double)
Sets the lower left Y location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
setUrX(double)
Sets the upper right X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
setUrY(double)
Sets the upper right Y location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
setUseDisplayList(boolean)
Determines whether Plotarea objects go into the chart's global DisplayList.

draw 
  public synchronized void draw(Graphics g)
Draws a plotting region to the specified Graphics class
Parameters:
g - Graphics class to draw

  public synchronized void draw3d(Graphics g)
Draws a plotting region with 3-D visual effects using the specified Graphics class.
Parameters:
g - Graphics class to draw
resize 
  public synchronized void resize(int w,
                                  int h)
Resizes the ploting area based on changes in the overall chart size. Note: this does not specify a Plotarea relative size and location, which is specified with llX, llY, urX, and urY methods.
Parameters:
w - new chart width
h - new chart height

  public Gc getGc()
Inquires the Gc used for this Plotarea's graphical attributes
Returns:
The Plotarea Gc

Sets a new Gc for this Plotarea
Parameters:
g - new Gc class

Inquires the upper right X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.

  public void setUrX(double d)
Sets the upper right X location of this Plotarea, which is a double ranging from 0 to 1.
Parameters:
d - Upper right X location

getUseDisplayList 
  public boolean getUseDisplayList()
Inquires whether this Plotarea should add objects to the chart's global DisplayList. Objects are added by default when the DisplayList is active.
Returns:
True if Plotarea objects go into DisplayList
See Also:
Globals
setUseDisplayList 
  public void setUseDisplayList(boolean onOff)
Determines whether Plotarea objects go into the chart's global DisplayList. By setting onOff to false, you can eliminate Plotarea objects from the DisplayList
Parameters:
onOff - True if Plotareas should go into DisplayList
toString 
  public String toString()
